data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3305964,"name":"","username":"manso","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/e99b99/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-02-09T21:24:33.354Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe’re doing a swerve drive and we finally recieved our CANCoders in the mail today, we’ve set them up and wired them perfectly. I copied and modifed the code from \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eFRC\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"FIRST Robotics Competition\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e 0 to Auto’s Swerve Drive video, tweaked the gear ratios, etc…\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eBut I don’t know how to determine the offset of the CANCoders.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-02-09T21:24:33.354Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":321,"reads":79,"readers_count":78,"score":1615.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":454095,"topic_slug":"how-can-i-determine-the-offset-of-our-cancoders","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55649,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"6593 Alumni/Programming Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/how-can-i-determine-the-offset-of-our-cancoders/454095/1","custom_user_title":"6593 Alumni/Programming Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3305978,"name":"shawn","username":"khillans","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/khillans/{size}/211310_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-09T21:47:12.015Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eYou want to set your wheels to all face forward with the bevels all facing the same direction. . The simpler option is to use tuner X, when you plug into your can bus Click the button with that red arrow is pointing to and then your magnet offset will be set. However there is a chance that your cancoders can lose this value over many power cycles so it would be better to set it up in the code. You can save this as a Encoder offset (make sure you save an offset per wheel since they should all be diffrent). Than add that as the offset when setting the config of your cancoders\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003cimg src=\"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/uploads/default/original/3X/4/d/4d0d665dff57823c6f2c51d41339220cc9b12ef9.png\" alt=\"image\" data-base62-sha1=\"aZDtph8og6LJ4YU3hpFmQ8HJgH7\" width=\"594\" height=\"349\"\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-02-09T21:47:12.015Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":14,"reads":72,"readers_count":71,"score":84.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":454095,"topic_slug":"how-can-i-determine-the-offset-of-our-cancoders","display_username":"shawn","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":44551,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/how-can-i-determine-the-offset-of-our-cancoders/454095/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":true,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3506229,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2025-02-08T21:48:02.309Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
